features: One 6 oz. tube of Alba Botanica Hawaiian Replenishing Cocoa Butter Hand & Body Lotion
Nourishes dry skin with botanical emollients like cocoa butter and shea butter
Made with a plant-based blend of botanical ingredients like jojoba, macadamia, flax and sunflower oils
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates, or sulfates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Treat yourself to an at-home spa day with Alba Botanica Replenishing Cocoa Butter Hawaiian Hand & Body Lotion. This lotion nourishes and pampers dry skin with botanical emollients such as cocoa butter and shea butter combined with a blend of jojoba, macadamia, flax and sunflower oils. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or harsh sulfates. It is also not tested on animals. Includes one 24 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica Replenishing Cocoa Butter Hawaiian Hand & Body Lotion. At Alba Botanica, our product family constantly evolves alongside health, beauty, and ingredient knowledge and trends. We’re dedicated to making high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. Do beautiful – that’s the motto that motivates our body loving products that nourish the skin, hair and, of course, the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Replenishing Cocoa Butter Hawaiian Hand & Body Lotion Treat yourself to an at-home spa day with Alba Botanica Replenishing Cocoa Butter Hawaiian Hand & Body Lotion. This lotion nourishes and pampers dry skin with botanical emollients such as cocoa butter and shea butter combined with a blend of jojoba, macadamia, flax and sunflower oils. Our 100% vegetarian formula is hypo-allergenic and does not contain any parabens, phthalates or harsh sulfates. It is also not tested on animals.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free Many of Alba Botanica products are packaged in bottles made from 100% post-consumer resin. Our unit cartons are also made with sustainably sourced paper stock.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated tomaking high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Hawaiian Kukui Nut Body Oil Hawaiian Pineapple Enzyme Facial Cleanser Hawaiian Jasmine & Vitamin E Moisture Cream Hawaiian Aloe & Green Tea Oil Free Moisturizer More Body Care Products from Alba Botanica Sunflower seed oil, macadamia seed oil and sweet almond oil work to hydrate and protect skin from moisture loss. Made with pore pleasing papaya and pineapple enzymes, this cleanser works its magic to clear out impurities as gentle buffing granules smooth away dulling debris to unveil radiant skin. Nourishing jojoba, kukui nut and sweet almond oils provide intense hydration, while papaya, jasmine and vitamin E soothe and revitalize skin. Antioxidant green tea, gotu kola, cucumber and aloe nourish skin and infuse it with extra moisture, leaving it with a silky-smooth feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorites
reviews.reviewText: I like this lotions, the smell is sweet like fresh cooked waffle cones. The smell can be a little overwhelming if your not into it. It's a nice thickness for the colder months and absorbs well. It doesn't look like they sell the big bottle anymore. Unfortunately the rating on EWG is not great for this, mostly due to the fragrance, so probably will not buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product for years. Does not leave you feeling greasy, and absorbs quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the drugstore holy grail for someone who is incredibly picky about hand cream
reviews.reviewText: first - i am not kidding in the headline. i am extremely picky about hand cream, despite having hands that are dry as the sahara. if it's greasy or leaves a sort of film, i hate it. if it leaves my hands slick, i hate it even more. i had just given up finding anything outside of asian beauty brands - aside from l'occitaine, which, well, love their handcream, but my wallet does not love the price. until i picked up some of this stuff in desperation at the store. IT'S FANTASTIC. it doesn't sink in as instantly as some korean handcreams, but it sinks in pretty darn quick. it isn't greasy, it doesn't leave my hands slick, and it packs some real moisturising power. the scent is really lovely.best of all, since it's also for body, it is great to just put some on your feet at night and anywhere else that needs a bit of care like your elbows.i've absolutely been going through a tube of this about every two months. amazon makes it really easy to repurchase, and the cost is SO much better than having to special order from asian companies or having to fork over a huge amount of cash for very bougie handcream each time. plus i can use it on my feet as well, so it gets to replace not just one but *two* beauty products in my routine and save me even more money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This product was great
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell and creaminess of this product, will definitely buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Many reviews mention how great the scent is, and it really is great, but many can’t quite figure out what the scent is. I get a chocolate (or cocoa - go figure since it’s cocoa butter lotion) scent right away, then after I’ve worked it into my skin, it takes on a sweeter, cookie-like smell that others have mentioned. It’s really a great lotion. Not greasy at all, goes on very easily and smooth. Absorbs quickly and leaves your skin very soft I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ok replenishing Hand & Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: Just received this product and it does the job of replenishing and moisterizing your skin. It does not leave a film as other reviews have been posted. It does have that cocoa butter scent that isn't as strong it's actually light order doesn't smell bad as some reviews have been left on this product. I'm ok with the product but probably wont buy it again. Just being honest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If You Like A Strong Cocoa Butter Scent
reviews.reviewText: Positives- This lotion has a nice scent, but it smells very strongly of cocoa butter though. If you're a fan of cocoa butter, then great, but if not, then I wouldn't recommend buying it. I liked the scent, so I consider this a positive.- My favorite thing about this lotion is that it moisturized very well without making my skin feel greasy.Negatives- As much as I liked the scent, I couldn't get rid of it. Whatever I touched for the entire day seemed to smell like cocoa butter, and no matter how many times I washed my hands, the smell still lingered. I don't mind a strong smelling lotion, but it would have been nice to not last for quite so long.- In my opinion, this is a very expensive lotion for the amount that comes in here. I should have known that when I bought it, but I guess that I was hoping that it was a really high quality lotion. It was very good, but I didn't feel that it did a better job moisturizing than bigger lotions that I've bought at a cheaper price.Overall ThoughtsI liked this lotion, and I would certainly recommend it to anyone who is looking for cruelty free products, or anyone who is a fan of strong cocoa butter scents. For me personally though, I didn't think that it was quite worth it for the money, so I probably wouldn't purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fabulous cream for body- use every day.
Mai più senza, pelle meravigliosa in poco tempo
No me gustó el olor como cualquier otra crema común y corriente
Fabulous product, nice light fresh scent. I’ve purchased three of the lotion and one of the oil to date and it is one of the best non greasy moisturizers!
I love how moisturizing this cream is and how it has a gentle scent but not overwhelming.
